titles.title: To amend section 4002 of the Emergency Wartime Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2003 to provide that the same temporary extended unemployment benefits which are available to certain former employees of domestic air carriers be extended to former employees of foreign air carriers who are similarly situated, and for other purposes.

To amend section 4002 of the Emergency Wartime Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2003 to provide that the same temporary extended unemployment benefits which are available to certain former employees of domestic air carriers be extended to former employees of foreign air carriers who are similarly situated, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: Amends the Emergency Wartime Supplemental Appropriations Act, 2003 to extend to certain former employees of foreign air carriers the same type of temporary extended unemployment benefits that are available to certain former employees of domestic air carriers.
